synopsis.text: That was a time of tranquility for the three warring academies of Kanto, having defeated the Demon King and formed an alliance with Seito academy. Hakufu, a spirited fighter, dreams of battling powerful opponents in tournaments across the globe. To fund her journey, she takes up a job, but her plans take an unexpected turn when new allies and adversaries emerge, questioning her leadership skills. Amidst this turmoil, a mysterious girl named Chuubou arrives, claiming to be Hakufu's younger sister. As Hakufu grapples with doubts about her mother's past and her own abilities, an old enemy, Housen Ryofu, resurfaces, further fueling the chaos. With her dreams of world-conquering battles on the line, Hakufu must navigate these challenges and unravel the secrets of her past.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
